value.title: Add Leading Zeros to a Number in Power BI Using Power Query
value.excerpt: There are a lot of situations where you need to add some leading zeros to a number. A common example of this is to create a month-year combination code using both month and year, and making sure the month is always two digits, regardless of being 1 or 12.
